summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating IntroScreen to delay fade-out and call onComplete at ~2000ms total (1000ms visible + 1000ms fade). However, there are additional non-requested file modifications (metadata/summaries) that go beyond the strictly requested timing-only change, though they likely do not affect runtime behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json (e.g., new_feature_requests entries AR-1/AR-2, summary/notes) which was not requested as part of changing splash timing.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints say no other changes besides splash/intro overlay timing; project_state.json changes are unrelated to runtime timing implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt with extensive descriptions of multiple files/features unrelated to splash timing.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and goes beyond changing only the intro/splash overlay timing.
